posts.post_content: This is very nice card. It's the 2nd best "pitch" card from Alliances. Obviously, Force of Will blows them all away. This card is a nice way to kill/weaken 1-2 creatures. Even better, you can do it without paying mana. This card has definitely had a big impact on a number of games for me. 4/5

Posted By: Pontiac (3/19/2011 12:15:53 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Saved me in Allied Nations. I had lost 20 life from an opponent with Quest for the Nihil Stone and just barely managed to kill him with [Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief). I was at five due to an ally with lifegain instants. But then my other opponent swung with a 7/2 flying. everything I owned was tapped (Drana and my swamps) so he just told me I was dead. Then I played this.  
To me, 5/5 from now on.
posts.html:
